name: Waking from a Dream
description: Dreams and fantasies of all sorts can be indulged within the holodeck. But there is a danger in lingering in the ethereal realm of that which could be, but is not.
rules:
-- There are two Phases to this Event! Each Phase is individually timed.
-- In this Hybrid Event, you will complete Supply Missions in one phase, and Specialist Missions in another phase.
-- In a Specialist Event, you will select crew to engage in Specialist Missions.
-- Only a single crew with corresponding skills can be assigned to a Specialist Mission. After the mission is complete, that crew will be disabled from doing Specialist Missions for some period of time.
-- Specialist Missions take time to complete. The higher selected crew skills are the less time it will take them to complete a mission.
-- Only the highest skill of a crew is considered when calculating time to complete a mission.
-- Using crew with matching Specialist Mission bonus traits will significantly decrease time needed to complete a mission.
-- Each time a Specialist Mission is completed, some progress is also gained on the Main Mission. Completing the Main Mission rewards substantial amounts of Event Victory Points.
-- When you fail to gain bonus progress on the Main Mission using featured crew or crew with matching event bonus traits, the bonus progress chance goes up slightly the next time you use such crew in a mission. If you score the bonus progress, the bonus chance amount goes back to its initial value. 
-- Using any version of Minuet, Fenna, Charlene, or Holograms will provide a bonus to Supply Missions and Specialist Missions.
-- Every Faction or Specialist Mission you complete earns you Event Victory Points. Collect Event Victory Points to unlock Threshold Rewards!
-- Community Rewards are also available during Phase 1 only. Collect Event Victory Points to unlock these rewards before the phase change!
-- In this event, Squadrons may also compete to advance up the Squadron leaderboards. Join a Squadron to get more rewards!
bonus_text: Crew Bonus: Minuet, Fenna, Charlene, or Holograms
rewards_teaser: Reach Rank 1 by gaining Victory Points from Event Missions!

featured_crew.name: Seven
featured_crew.flavor: Seven decided to create her own holoprogram where she was a human - with her successes, victories and weaknesses.

action.name: The Past Few Days Have Been Memorable

featured_crew.name: Fenna
featured_crew.flavor: Fenna was a projection of Nidell when she was in deep emotional distress.

action.name: I Wish I Could Stay Longer

featured_crew.name: Charlene
featured_crew.flavor: The Doctor’s holographic wife with whom he explored what it might be like to be a working father.

action.name: Line Up Next To The Door, Children

rewards.name: Chronitons
rewards.flavor: Chronitons allow your crew to take action in these chaotic times. Use Chronitons to replay parts of past missions via the Timeline.

rewards.name: Brahms
rewards.flavor: A holographic representation of Enterprise-D warp system designer Doctor Leah Brahms.

rewards.flavor: ISM, or interstellar medium, is the matter that exists between astronomical objects. It can be manipulated by the Q to facilitate crew retrieval. ISM can be obtained from Daily Log-in Rewards, Campaigns and participating in Fleet activities.

rewards.name: Dilithium
rewards.flavor: Dilithium is your most valuable asset. Use Dilithium in the Time Portal to acquire valuable crew members, items, and more.

rewards.name: Honor
rewards.flavor: Honor is gained by dismissing crew who have served you well, but are ready for reassignment. Redeem in the Time Portal for exclusive crew, special fusion-related items, training programs, and more.

rewards.name: Merits
rewards.flavor: Merits can be earned by completing missions. Use Merits to acquire faction-based rewards, upgrades to your ship, and more.

rewards.name: Training
rewards.flavor: Increases crew XP by 2500.

rewards.name: Seven
rewards.flavor: Seven decided to create her own holoprogram where she was a human - with her successes, victories and weaknesses.

action.name: The Past Few Days Have Been Memorable

rewards.name: Charlene
rewards.flavor: The Doctor’s holographic wife with whom he explored what it might be like to be a working father.

rewards.name: 10x Portal
rewards.flavor: 10 valuable items. Go to Time Portal to collect!

goals.flavor: Turn a fantastical profit with Ferengi Traditionalists.

potential_rewards.name: Ferengi Traditionalists Transmission
potential_rewards.flavor: Spent to acquire Ferengi Traditionalists faction missions.

potential_rewards.name: Credits
potential_rewards.flavor: Credits are the galaxy's standard currency. Use Credits in the Time Portal to enlist crew members, build items, and more.

rewards.name: Chronitons
rewards.flavor: Chronitons allow your crew to take action in these chaotic times. Use Chronitons to replay parts of past missions via the Timeline.

goals.flavor: Hunt the cause of this photonic chaos with the Hirogen.
